# isSameView

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the drag and the drop are within the same text view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isSameView: Bool { get }
```

## Getting information about the text drop request

- **dropPosition**: The text position corresponding to the location of a drop session.
- **suggestedProposal**: The text drop proposal offered by the text view.
